interactions.notes: Caught up over coffee. She shared exciting news about landing a new photography client - a local wedding venue. Talked about her new camera lens purchase. Her dog Max is doing well. She mentioned wanting to hike the Blue Ridge trail before winter.
interactions.nextSteps: Follow up in 2 weeks to see how first wedding shoot went. Suggest Blue Ridge hike date for early November.

interactions.notes: She texted photos from weekend hike at Mountain Peak trail. Beautiful fall colors. Quick chat about weather turning colder.

Long catch-up call. Discussed her photography business challenges - marketing and finding clients. Offered to share contacts. She's considering a new camera body but trying to save money. Mentioned her birthday coming up in March.
interactions.nextSteps: Send photography networking group info. Remember birthday planning for March.

upcomingActions.action: Follow up on wedding photography shoot
Plan Blue Ridge trail hike together
